This is a test for http://bugzilla.opendarwin.org/show_bug.cgi?id=9388 REGRESSION: outlines don't get erased when removed in some cases.

There should be a green square and no trace of red.

(GraphicsLayer
  (bounds 800.00 600.00)
  (children 1
    (GraphicsLayer
      (bounds 800.00 600.00)
      (contentsOpaque 1)
      (drawsContent 1)
      (repaint rects
        (rect 4.00 16.00 788.00 206.00)
        (rect 8.00 16.00 784.00 202.00)
        (rect 4.00 114.00 108.00 108.00)
        (rect 8.00 118.00 100.00 100.00)
      )
    )
  )
)
